titleStmt.title: De instrumentis plantariis cui usui inserviunt, & quomodo sunt tractanda / a Samuele Fostero ... = Of the planetary instruments : to what end they serve, and how they are to be used / by Samuel Foster ...
titleStmt.author: Foster, Samuel, d. 1652.

notesStmt.note: Text in Latin and English in facing parallel columns.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
